projects.title: Senior Front End Developer - (Publicis Sapient)
projects.description: Presently, I am designing User Interfaces for a tech giant that are cross browser compatible & responsive.
pointers: Designed mega features for Tapestry/Coach that are reusable across multiple domains and supported in a range of devices with cross browser compatibility.
Developed many common utilities and featues that are used by fellow teammates across multiple domains
Took care of performance by implementing lazy-loading,throttling,debouncing,etc.
Participated in design & code reviews to build robut applications & prototypes

projects.title: Front End Developer - (Publicis Sapient)
projects.description: Designed User Interfaces for E-commerce giants that were cross browser compatible & responsive. Also, developed many reusable components that were used by fellow teammates.
pointers: Developed multiple scalable/reusable features for Marriott International and enhanced application performance by reducing TLS handshake time b/w ajax calls by warming up pods on scaling.
Revamped Cartier application, making production ready keeping in mind the tight timelines.

projects.title: Senior System Engineer - (Infosys)
projects.description: Partnered with Team Leads and Product Owners to design and develop robust Banking solutions that was highly performant, cross-browser compatible and responsive.
pointers: Developed responsive, accessible & performant User Interfaces that were functional across major browsers and devices.
Enhanced application for performance by implementing Throttling,Debouncing,Event-Delegation,etc. and took care of Accessibility
Implemented SMS banking in server side using tech-stack Node.js & Express.js

projects.title: Internship - (Infosys)
projects.description: During my Interniship at Infosys,I was trained on various front-end & back-end technologies and also got a chance to build up a project on Machine Learning
pointers: Designed an application that predicted a winner of a cricket match based on various factors.
Performed Data Sanity and used Machine Learning(Regression Model) to train the models for the use case.
Gained knowledge of Regression models & various Python libraries (Numpy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Scikit Learn)
